EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Nov13 Data Integration Webinar Series
EmailTemplate.subject: Intapp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar Invite -- Suspect
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}: Thank you for registering for the webinar. Below are the dates and times for all 4 webinars in the series. For each webinar you'd like to attend, click the "Add to Calendar" link, which will provide you with a calendar event with all the dial-in and web conferencing information.
Cloud Strategies for Law Firms 13 November | 2:15pm GMT Add to Calendar: http://www.intapp.com/images/webinars/calendar-events/Cloud%20Strategies%20for%20Law%20Firms%20Webinar.ics
Swapping Your Practice Management System 20 November | 2:15pm GMT Add to Calendar: http://www.intapp.com/images/webinars/calendar-events/Swapping%20Your%20Practice%20Management%20System%20Webinar.ics
Managing Firm Mergers 27 November | 2:15pm GMT Add to Calendar: http://www.intapp.com/images/webinars/calendar-events/Managing%20Firm%20Mergers%20Webinar.ics
Integrating with Dun & Bradstreet 4 December | 2:15pm GMT Add to Calendar: http://www.intapp.com/images/webinars/calendar-events/Integrating%20with%20Dun%20Bradstreet%20Webinar.ics
http://www.intapp.com
